summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1847, for the improvement of Maynard Avenue, from the south margin of Weller Street to Seattle Boulevard; Seattle Boulevard, from Sixth Avenue South to the intersection of Massachusetts Street and Ninth Avenue South; and Ninth Avenue South from Massachusetts Street to Holgate's Street, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of bridge, as therein provided, under Ordinance No. 19235, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
